content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_explorer;
----------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------Primera Tarea leer archivo calendar.csv
----------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ';',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS calendar;

--Revisar el tipo de dato que le asigna Synapse
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''calendar.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''electric_vehicle_data_bronze'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '';'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS calendar;'

--Cambiar el tipo de datos para economizar las consultas

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ';',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) WITH (
    date_key        INT 1, 
    date            DATE 2, 
    year            SMALLINT 3, 
    month           TINYINT 4, 
    day             TINYINT 5, 
    month_name      VARCHAR(10) 6, 
    day_name        VARCHAR(10) 7,
    day_of_year     SMALLINT 8,
    week_of_month   TINYINT 9, 
    week_of_year    TINYINT 10
) as calendar;
